newsitem.title: USA: Country Maid Foods expands board by one.
newsitem.headline: Country Maid Foods expands board by one.

text.p: Country Maid Foods Inc said Tuesday it appointed Dean Hughson to its board of directors, expanding the panel to three members.

The company said Hughson has served as an executive at a major egg producing company and a large egg processing company, in addition to being a former chairman of the United Egg Association Further Processors Division, a national industry advocacy group.
Country Maid is an egg producer that had 500,000 hens laying 240,000 eggs per week at the end of 1996.
